arts.ttl: “Significant loss” – Injury concern ahead of Athletic Club v Arsenal
arts.sum: Arsenal will take on Athletic Club Bilbao in the first Champions League clash of this season at the Estadio San Mamés on Tuesday. The Basque club could be without Nico Williams for the European tie against Arsenal, after the star picked up an injury in Spain’s World Cup qualifier win over Turkey last week.
